resources.string: Did you enjoy the app?\nTake a time to rate and help us!
Error. Check if your GPS is on and wait a few seconds.
Start location saved successfully. Go to the next spot.

The app is focused on measuring the smallest distance between two spots using your GPS location. NOTE: If you\'re GPS is on but is not detected, please Close the app and open it again.\nSee the available ways to do it:

Simply press the "start" button on the place you want to start and then press "stop" after moving to the second spot. There could be a small variation. \nWe recommend you to use your GPS instead of Wi-Fi or cellphone network location.

You can also save spots for future use. Press "save" under the desired Spot to save a place. To see the distance from a saved place, just tap over the spot name (Ex. "spot1" or the name you have chosen) and the distance will be shown.
Need any help? Have a suggestion or a comment?
Feel free to send us an email, we\'ll always reply and learn with your words.
